## IControllerMouseEvent interface

Base interface for all controller mouse and pointer events.

Extends the base event with positional and button information, as well as modifier keys.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface IControllerMouseEvent<T extends string> extends IBaseEvent<T>, IModKey 
```
**Extends:** [IBaseEvent](doc/markdown/./scene.ibaseevent.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;, [IModKey](doc/markdown/./scene.imodkey.md)
